title:
2023 sees Nvidia reign as top chip company by market cap, Broadcom 
surpasses TSMC to claim second place
text: Credit: AFP Over the past year, the global semiconductor industry has experienced lackluster demands in the downstream electronics sector. AI and geopolitical uncertainties have been driving investments and become the growth drivers.
